meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: Message from Dr. Conners"Good Morning, Cincinnati Technology Academy," will officially kick off our first day of the 2019-2020 school year, and our community school will be on the road to redefining education in the 21st Century. The Cincinnati Techno

link.title: Cincinnati Technology Academy - Home

img.alt: Click to open the About Us menu

h3.span: "Good Morning, Cincinnati Technology Academy," will officially kick off our first day of the 2019-2020 school year, and our community school will be on the road to redefining education in the 21st Century. The Cincinnati Technology Academy will utilize technology to customize learning for each child (k-12). This approach allows every child to build on his/her own skill needs. Students will have laptop and desktop computers and 24/7 access to our school's rigorous and state-aligned courses. Cincinnati Technology Academy's courseware is provided by Compass Learning and Odysseyware. CompassLearning is an all comprehensive K through 2nd grade curriculum. Also Odysseyware is an all comprehensive 3rd grade through 12th grade curriculum. Students will enjoy learning new concepts, while earning prizes. This program makes learning fun and builds strong academic skills and concepts for all students.

p.span: Learn more calling the school office at:

span.style: FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA
span.data-mce-style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA;

p.span: The Cincinnati Technology Academy’s mission is to strengthen each individual’s capacity to be life-long learners. The Academy’s goals are to facilitate others in discovering their individual talents, enhance their quest for knowledge, and foster a strong sense of confidence. The means to this end is in an Individually Guided Education– Comprehensive Electronic Curriculum (IGE-CEC) instructional model that provides an Individualized Learning Plan for each student. A model that recognizes that “one-size doesn’t fit all,” and believes in the learning capacity of each individual regardless of current ability levels. The audacity of the school is to provide every learner with a customized learning plan that fosters self-direction, self-determination, and self-actualization.

div.p: Cincinnati Technology Academy serves grades K-12. Cincinnati Technology Academy is a tuition free school with limited spaces in most grades. The school office located at 3800 Glenway Avenue, Cincinnati Ohio 45205 is open Monday through Friday from 9:00 am to 3:30 pm. Walk-ins are welcomed.
